subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Preakness Stakes
lead_paragraph: American Pharoah is the 4-5 favorite for the Preakness Stakes with his stable mate, Dortmund, 7-2 in the morning line.
snippet: American Pharoah is the 4-5 favorite for the Preakness Stakes with his stable mate, Dortmund, 7-2 in the morning line.
